arts.ttl: All 12 Championship weekend games predictions - Week 13
arts.sum:
Frank Lampard's Coventry kick off the weekend schedule knowing victory at Wrexham on Friday sends them six points clear at the top of the Championship — for 24 hours at least.

That is one of 12 matches in a full weekend Championship programme and here are our thoughts on all of them.

arts.ttl: Charlton vs Swansea predictions: Addicks to extend unbeaten run
arts.sum: Charlton are in decent form of late and Elliott Bretland is forecasting Sonny Carey will inspire the Addicks to a home win over Swansea City on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Bree starts: Charlton Athletic team news and predicted XI to face Swansea City
arts.sum: The latest Charlton Athletic team news and predicted XI as Nathan Jones’s side gear up to face Swansea in the Championship. The post Bree starts: Charlton Athletic team news and predicted XI to face Swansea City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Charlton vs Swansea - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Charlton Athletic and Swansea City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
